description: Single storey front porch extension; Installation of solar panels to the front roof slope; single storey detached garden outbuilding for use as office.
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawings / document title number(s): ARC 11 R1 : Block plan / site plan ; ARC 12 R1 : general plan ; ARC 13R2 : ground floor plan ; ARC 14R1 : upper floor plan ; ARC 15R1 : roof plan ; ARC 16R1 : sections and elevations ; ARC 17 : sections and elevations ; ARC 01 : Block plan / Site plan ; ARC 02 : GF and roof plans section A ; ARC 03 : Ground floor plan ; ARC 04 : Upper floor plan ; ARC 05 : Roof plan ; ARC 06 : Elevations ; Design and Access statement.
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).

| The outbuilding hereby permitted shall be used for domestic purposes ancillary to the enjoyment of the main dwellinghouse at10 Avalon Close, West Ealing, London, W13 0BJ and not for any separate residential, industrial, commercial or business use. No cooking or kitchen facilities shall be installed into the outbuilding at any time.

Reason: To prevent the creation of a separate self-contained residential unit of accommodation in the interests of the living conditions of the existing and future residents of the site and to ensure that the use of the building does not, by reason of any other activity, harm the living conditions in the area, in accordance with policies 1.1,1.2 & 3.8 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D1 and D14 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
